rationale: The documentation did not mention the patient's difficulty in managing medication refills or any gaps in using the inhaler.
There was no suggestion of using an automatic refill service as a solution to the patient's medication adherence issue.
The patient's feeling of being overwhelmed by options was not documented, which is a relevant barrier to adherence.
No manageable plan or suggestion to start with one change at a time, such as setting up automatic refills, was documented.
There was no documentation of a follow-up plan or task to ensure the patient sets up the automatic refill service.
